t: Amazon Resale: Understanding Product Conditions - Amazon Customer Service
s: Explore Amazon Resale's condition ratings: Renewed, Used Like New, Used Very Good, Used Good, and Used Acceptable. Learn what each term means for Amazon Resale items.

t: Replace a Damaged, Defective, or Broken Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can replace items eligible for replacement through Your Orders. If the item doesn't have a replacement option or you received the item as a gift, you'll need to return the original item and place a new order. To return an item, visit Returns Items You Ordered.

t: Can You Trust Amazon Warehouse Deals? What is Amazon Used Like New? |
s: November 17, 2022 - And, despite the fact that I have now made several purchases at Amazon Warehouse Deals over the years, I still wondered if I would get what I was expecting. As in, no flaws, and a brand new product despite the condition being described as “Used, Like New”.

t: Criticism of Amazon's environmental impact - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Amazon has been criticized for their lobbying practices. Amazon has supported lobbying groups like the US Chamber of Commerce and the Business Roundtable who have pushed back on environmental protection clauses in the democrat-led Build Back Better bill.

t: Marketplace Items Condition Guidelines - Amazon Customer Service
s: Packaging may have a remainder cut-out, which should be noted in the listing comments. Used - Very Good: The packaging, cover art, liner notes, or inclusions may show limited signs of wear. Used - Good: The item or packaging may have identifying markings from its owner. Used - Acceptable: The item plays perfectly but is otherwise the worse for wear. Packaging and inclusions may be damaged...

t: r/amazonprime on Reddit: This is what "Condition: Used - Very Good Minor cosmetic damage on bottom or back of the item. Moderate packaging damage observed during inspection." looks like. Shoes were brand new with tags, not used. $140 shoe - 60 bux. Amazon Warehouse. Not my first pair bought from warehouse either.

t: Don't Trust Amazon Warehouse "Like New" Products - OzBargain Forums
s: December 5, 2022 - I bought a Samsung 4k monitor from Amazon Warehouse with the description, "Condition: Used - Like New - Item will come in original packaging. Packaging will be damaged." · I took this literally to mean that only the packaging will be damaged, but the product would be fine
